item.title: Multilevel Elasticities for a Single SKU
item.description: In this notebook I want to experiment with some basic models for price elasticity estimation in the simple context of a simple sku across multiple stores and regions. The motivation is to have a concrete example of the elasticity models presented in the Chapter 11: Big Data Pricing Models of the book Pricing Analytics by Walter R. Paczkowski. Elasticity Definition Here I provide a very succinct definition of elasticity (there is a vast literature on this topic, see the reference above).
